nodes.speaker: johnson15
nodes.text: I'm working on the prison. I'm building this room with no walls. It's designed to hold...[he leans in closer]...a great ancient evil.

responses.text: So what do you have so far?

nodes.speaker: johnson15
nodes.text: So, my plan is to make the walls out of solid reinforced steel. There's no way that evil overlord could get through.

nodes.speaker: johnson15
nodes.text: For the good quality stuff. Yeah. [He scratches his head.] I think they'll pay enough for it.

responses.text: Why don't you use something cheaper?
Bricks. They should be strong enough for a prison, but they're a lot cheaper.
Ice. It pretty much works as it's own air conditioning too.
Air. It's cheap. Plus, it's environmentally friendly. I'm sure they have other security measures.

nodes.speaker: johnson15
nodes.text: I would do ice. But I'm allergic to ice.

responses.text: You do know that ice is water, right?
What does...nevermind. I have a different suggestion.

nodes.speaker: johnson15
nodes.text: That's actually a good idea. It will save me money. I'll do that.

nodes.speaker: johnson15
nodes.text: I look a lot like my family. There are a lot of us.
